children.value: Thanks so much to everyone who has played, talked about, reviewed and made content for Mausritter so far. It's been amazing to see the community around the game grow. I hope that this new edition brings you many more hours of gaming fun and imagination with your friends and family!
It's a huge and dangerous world out there for a small mouse. But if you're very brave, and very clever and just a bit lucky, you might just survive.
